channel.title: [PI] conversions?

item.title: [PI] conversions?
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

i just made an interface for my [PI] base and now i need help with conversions. i downloaded one of those nonrenamed to renamed conversion programs and it works like crap and doesnt convert half the stuff :s so could anyone else help? heres the codes.

public static void dungeon(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intdungeon = AddTab(18898); intdungeon.anIntArray240 = new int[6]; intdungeon.anIntArray241 = new int[6]; intdungeon.anIntArray272 = new int[6]; //Main interface intdungeon.anIntArray240[0] = 18899; intdungeon.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //No main interface image. //Control 1 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[1] = 18900; intdungeon.anIntArray241[1] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[1] = 15; AddInterfaceLabel(18900, "Dungeoneering Floor 1", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); //Control 2 of main interface (Image) intdungeon.anIntArray240[2] = 18901; intdungeon.anIntArray241[2] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[2] = 15; AddInterfaceImage(18901, "dungeon", "sidebar.png"); //Control 3 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[3] = 18902; intdungeon.anIntArray241[3] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[3] = 35; AddInterfaceLabel(18902, "Dungeoneering Floor 1", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); //Control 4 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[4] = 18903; intdungeon.anIntArray241[4] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[4] = 73; AddInterfaceLabel(18903, "Dungeoneering Floor 3", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); //Control 5 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[5] = 18904; intdungeon.anIntArray241[5] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[5] = 54; AddInterfaceLabel(18904, "Dungeoneering Floor 2", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); //Control 6 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[6] = 18905; intdungeon.anIntArray241[6] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[6] = 111; AddInterfaceLabel(18905, "Dungeoneering Floor 5", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); //Control 7 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[7] = 18906; intdungeon.anIntArray241[7] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[7] = 149; AddInterfaceLabel(18906, "Dungeoneering Floor 7", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); //Control 8 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[8] = 18907; intdungeon.anIntArray241[8] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[8] = 92; AddInterfaceLabel(18907, "Dungeoneering Floor 4", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); //Control 9 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[9] = 18908; intdungeon.anIntArray241[9] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[9] = 168; AddInterfaceLabel(18908, "Dungeoneering Floor 8", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); //Control 10 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[10] = 18909; intdungeon.anIntArray241[10] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[10] = 187; AddInterfaceLabel(18909, "Dungeoneering Floor 9", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); //Control 11 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[11] = 18910; intdungeon.anIntArray241[11] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[11] = 206; AddInterfaceLabel(18910, "Dungeoneering Floor 10", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); //Control 12 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[12] = 18911; intdungeon.anIntArray241[12] = 4; intdungeon.anIntArray272[12] = 129; AddInterfaceLabel(18911, "Dungeoneering Floor 6", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); //Control 13 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[13] = 18912; intdungeon.anIntArray241[13] = 14; intdungeon.anIntArray272[13] = 229; AddInterfaceLabel(18912, "Dungeoneering Level:", wid, 1, 0xFFFFFF); //Control 14 of main interface (Label) intdungeon.anIntArray240[14] = 18913; intdungeon.anIntArray241[14] = 47; intdungeon.anIntArray272[14] = 15; AddInterfaceLabel(18913, "Dungeoneering", wid, 1, 0xFFFFFF); } 

dungeon(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
private static Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 GetInterfaceImage(String interfaceName, String s)
{
	//Basically, just a user-friedly edited version of an old one.
	long l = (Class50.method585((byte)1, s) << 8);
	Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = (Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1)aClass12_238.method222(l);
	if(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 != null)
	{
	return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
	}
	try
	{
	class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("./Interface Images/" + interfaceName + "/" + s);
	aClass12_238.method223(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1, l, (byte)2);
	}
	catch(Exception exception)
	{
	return null;
	}
	return class30_sub2_sub1_sub1;
}
